content: single_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch in the first single_crochet made total of 228 sts note we are now going to be working from left to right reverse single_crochet instead of from right to left as usual with the regular single_crochet round 4 chain 1 work 1 reverse single_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st the first reverse single_crochet made total of 228 sts fasten_off sleeves edging place stitch marker in first stitch made and move stitch marker up as your work progresses round 1 right side join new yarn in the marked st before the underarm join chain 1 work 6 single_crochet in the underarm area before the next marker work 1 single_crochet in the marked st and in each st around do not join total of 54 sts rounds 2 - 4 work 1 single_crochet in each st around do not join total of 54 sts round 5 slip_stitch in each st around join with an invisible join if you need help with the invisible join check out my tutorial total of 54 sts fasten_off weave in the ends congratulations you are finished you made it how beautiful was that follow me here youtube https //youtube com/@crochetandcopy ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/crochetandcopy pinterest https //pin it/x5kanby instagram https //www instagram com/invites/contact/ i=1o9z4a0ba9njs&utm_content=mhvk8te @crochet&copy twitter https //twitter com/crochetandcopy t=fm7hjmbncdwyhbyqvbbnha&s=09 if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/4iaqvq5omoo
